def is_in_bathroom(sink:item):
    # Define a function to check whether an item is a sink located in the bathroom
    symbol in_bathroom=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(sink, room)
    return in_bathroom

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and is_in_bathroom(sink):
            # If a sink located in the bathroom is found based on the available information
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and is_in_bathroom(sink)
            # Select a sink in the bathroom
            achieve close_char(char, sink)
            # Move character toward the identified bathroom sink

        else: 
            # If no bathroom sink is identified, explore further
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    # Inspect unvisited sinks
                    observe(sink, "Determine if this sink is located in the bathroom")
                    # Check if the sink is in the bathroom
